mapper.select: SELECT c.name,b.bed FROM `hisuserinfo` a LEFT JOIN hisdeptbedinfo b ON a.hisid = b.hisid LEFT JOIN dictionary c ON c.id = b.dept where a.token=#{token1}
SELECT count(1) FROM `hisuserinfo` a LEFT JOIN hisdeptbedinfo b ON a.hisid = b.hisid LEFT JOIN dictionary c ON c.id = b.dept where a.token=#{token}
